question: Double Asian Games medalist equestrian Fouaad Mirza, who recently secured Olympian quota belongs to which Indian state?
explanation: Fouaad Mirza is an Indian equestrian who won silver medals in both the individual eventing and the team eventing at the 2018 Asian Games. He became the first Indian since 1982 to win a medal at an individual event in the sport at the Asian Games. In 2019, Mirza received the Arjuna Award.He was Born in bengaluru city of Karnataka State.
